7246D7614C3EA27C422CE3903EFCD763: Spawns a mounted turret for players to use.
94D9329A49F0BA7DD003A3B260CCD5E8: Spawns a mounted turret for players to use.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.On Player Enters: A player enters the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.On Player Exits V: A player exits the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.On Vehicle Spawns: A vehicle is spawned or respawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Apply OffRoad Tir: Apply off-road tires to the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Vehicle Health.De: Determines how much damage the vehicle can take before destruction.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Vehicle Indestruc: Determines if the Vehicle can be destroyed by damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Destroy when Stuc: Determines if the Vehicle will destroy itself when stuck underwater.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.EnableRespawn.Des: Determines if the Vehicle will respawn after being destroyed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Enabled During Ph: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Visible During Ga: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Disable.Descripti: Disable the Vehicle Spawner, stopping it from spawning any more vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Enable.Descriptio: Enable the Vehicle Spawner, allowing it to spawn vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Allowed Class.Des: If set to All, All Classes (including players with NO CLASS) are affected. Otherwise, the chosen Class will be used to determine the Affects Class effect. ANY CLASS - Players with a Class assigned, regardless of what Class it is. NO CLASS - Players without any assigned class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Destroy Vehicle.D: If the vehicle that this spawner created still exists, destroy it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Destroy Vehicle W: ON will destroy an already spawned vehicle when this spawner is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Pop All Tires.Des: Pop all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to pop.
Repair all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to repair.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Repair Vehicle.De: Restore the spawned vehicle to full health.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Remove Tire Modif: Revert to road tires on the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Assigns Driver.De: Seats the player that instigated the message as the spawned vehicle's driver.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Respawn Vehicle.D: Spawns the vehicle (Destroying the existing vehicle if it still exists).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Activating Team.D: The Team this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Water Destruction: When the vehicle becomes too deep in water to drive, destroy it after this delay.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Respawn Time.Desc: When the vehicle is destroyed, respawn it after this delay. (The first vehicle spawned does not use this delay.)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_MountedTurret_C.Respawn Vehicle W: YES will spawn a vehicle when the device is enabled. ONLY IF NEEDED will not reset an existing vehicle.
